Trade/Device Name(s): Virtuoso™M System for IHC (SP1) with Benchmark ULTRA stainer
Submitter Information: Ventana Medical Systems, Inc. Digital Pathology
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Virtuoso™M System for IHC ER (SP1) with Benchmark ULTRA stainer, a digital pathology and image analysis system assisting in the detection and measurement of estrogen receptor protein in breast cancer tissue.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids pathologists in digital display, detection, semi-quantitative measurement, and review of estrogen receptor protein in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded neoplastic tissue; adjunctive to CONFIRM anti-Estrogen Receptor (ER) (SP1) assay in assessing breast cancer patients for endocrine treatment consideration.
